title: Colour blind feature for skins like blood moon thresh or Forsaken Jayce.
body: I was wondering if riot could make an expansion to their already colour blind mode, since colour blind mode only affects the team colours, they should allso make it affect some skins aswell, skins like blood moon {{champion:412}} or Forsaken {{champion:126}} . at the very least change their skills like jayce's Shock Blast or thresh's hook, for the minority who are colour blind like my friend the read tends to blend with the ground of the rift making it harder to see ( not all obviously since their are different types). If riot could implement such a feature it would help out people like him with the slight disadvantage.

replies.body: Why would people downvote this? There's literally nothing wrong with this suggested. I upvoted you back to 0 man.
